text: i used a js custom code to do this, seems to do the job so far
split it into an array and took the first item and stored it in another property field

question on how ecomm integrators with stripe handle their first/last name field and break it into HubSpot-is that native in the integration and then we use a workflow to map the property? or how does that work? I have a client wanting to use info for payments to trigger email workflows post sale

<@U01QVR44MEY> - Sorry for the late reply. I have a custom object *Students*. If I add a note in the *Student*, Is it possible that It will automatically tick the contacts associated with *Students*? For example, the custom object *Families*. See the image below.
You can definitely build a workflow to do this
Just set a createdate known field for the workflow enrollment trigger, then use custom code to lookup the latest note, then create the same note on the families object, using custom code again
